posts.post_content:
I am most likely going to sell my T206 SGC graded partial set. All four of my children will be in undergraduate school next year. It's unbelievable. Anyway, There are over 210 cards graded SGC 50 and above with the following key cards and Hall of Famers. Cards can be seen on the Sgc registry under "Long Strange Trip" or if this link works...
[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=239&userset=2121[/url]


Sgc 60

Baker
Beckley
Bender (portrait)
Brown (cubs)
Chance (batting)
Chance (red)
Chase (dark cap)
Collins (Jimmy)
Collins (Eddie)
Cobb (bat on)
Duffy
Griffith (portrait)
Greiminger
Johnson (portrait)
Kleinow (Boston)
Lajoie (bat)  Piedmont 42
Lajoie (throwing)
Marquard (hands at hips)
Mathewson (white cap)
Scott (Carolina Brights)
Young (glove shows)

SGC 70

Evers (w/bat)
Mathewson (dark cap)
Mcgraw (no cap)
Walsh
Wheat
Young (bare hand)

Other cards included are

Shappe
Chase (white cap) Sgc 88
7 sgc 80's
A bunch of Sgc 50 Hall of Famers, Piedmont 42s, and tough commons.

A great way to get a jump on a Vg/x to Ex T206 set. I would like to sell as a whole , but I will consider anything including selling individually, ebay or auction house. Please call if interested, I love to chat t206 anytime. 434-825-6792.  Thanks Martin
E-mail sent on the Evers portrait if you're interested in selling separately.
Email sent.
I actually sent you 2 emails...I missed a few cards the first time.

Email sent on 8 Brooklyn Player.
Thanks
mike
Email sent on Jim Scott & Al Shaw. And others!

Hey Martin

Sent you an e-mail on a bunch of cards. 

Thanks!

Scott
Just a quick bump, has anyone heard back from Martin on these yet?
I haven't
I haven't either
I have not as well. I too was wondering.

Just stopped by the house for a minute and checked the board. My fault guys for not responding quickly, been pretty busy. I have priced them and should be able to email everyone tonight. I didn't get any offers on the whole lot, so I will be able to sell some individually. Thanks again.
Martin
Thanks Martin. I appreciate the update.
Please send me a comprehensive price list, if you have one. If not, I'll send you a list of approx. 15 cards I'm interested in. Thank you. Tim.    [url]timothy_browne@hotmail.com[/url]
Thanks Martin, looking forward to hearing back on the 3 cards I requested.  :)

Thanks Martin, interested in the brooklyn players, If it's easier you can send entire list, Looking for brooklyn players [url]wrenbird17@aol.com[/url]
thanks

If you do put together a price list I would also like a copy. [url]sbfinley.mac@gmail.com[/url]

thanks

I finally got some time to individually price most of my T206 set. I hope I got back to everyone who inquired about the set and single cards. If there is a particular card that shows up in the sgc registry but not on the price list, it is because it is on somewhat of a short list of cards I would prefer to keep. That list is contains about 50 cards now, but I will pare it down to around 20. If the card you want is on that list, make an offer if you like.  Shipping and handling included. If using paypal, please add 3%. Thanks again for your patience. Martin 434-825-6792

I can only put 5 attachments in one post so the last few cards will be on the next post

my set [url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=239&userset=2121[/url]
